scripts.test:e2e: pnpm tailwind:build && npx playwright test tests/e2e/agent_ui.spec.ts --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:e2e:with-servers: pnpm tailwind:build && node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('powershell -File tests/run_e2e_tests.ps1', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('bash tests/run_e2e_tests.sh', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.test:ci: pnpm tailwind:build && node tests/ensure_report_dir.js && cross-env CI=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/simple_test.spec.ts --reporter=list,json --passWithNoTests || true
scripts.test:ci:windows: pnpm tailwind:build && node tests/ensure_report_dir.js && cross-env CI=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/simple_test.spec.ts --reporter=list,json --skip-browser-install --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:ci:new: node tests/ensure_report_dir.js && node tests/enhanced_mock_path_to_regexp.js && node run-tests-ci.js
scripts.test:simple: pnpm tailwind:build && npx playwright test tests/e2e/simple_test.spec.ts --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:headless: pnpm tailwind:build && cross-env CI=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/simple_test.spec.ts --headed=false --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:environments: vitest run tests/environment_detection.spec.js tests/platform_specific.spec.js tests/docker_environment.spec.js tests/ci_environment.spec.js tests/environment_api.spec.js tests/environment_ui.spec.jsx
scripts.test:playwright:env:ci: cross-env CI=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
scripts.test:playwright:env:docker: cross-env DOCKER_ENVIRONMENT=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
scripts.test:playwright:env:k8s: cross-env KUBERNETES_SERVICE_HOST=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
scripts.test:playwright:env:aws: cross-env AWS_REGION=us-west-2 npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
scripts.test:playwright:env:azure: cross-env AZURE_FUNCTIONS_ENVIRONMENT=true npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
scripts.test:playwright:env:gcp: cross-env GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT=test-project npx playwright test tests/e2e/environment-aware.spec.ts
